title.rendered: Hard to deny You : Jonathan Max’s Debut Single Brings a Fresh Sound to the British and Swiss Pop Scene

content.rendered:
Jonathan Max

LAUSANNE, VAUD, SWITZERLAND, April 14, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Swiss-British artist Jonathan Max, living in Lausanne, is pleased to announce the release of his first single entitled “Hard to Deny You” on April 14th 2023.
The track brings a new breath in Swiss pop.
“Hard to Deny You” is the result of a collaboration between Jonathan Max and Lausanne-based producer Ivan Hermez. The song is an ode to

relationships, punctuated by Jonathan Max’s soft and melodious voice and catchy sound arrangements.

The single “Hard to Deny You” will not be the only new release from Jonathan Max.

Indeed, the artist will also release his first album in collaboration with the label Rootness and the publisher Sido Music Publishing. The album will be a showcase for the artist and will contain a variety of songs in a pop style.

Jonathan Max is a passionate artist who works hard to create unique music that reflects his personality and style, which he has drawn from his musical influences primarily based on pop and R&B. He is looking forward to sharing his tracks with the world.

The single “Hard to Deny You” will be available on all music streaming platforms starting April 14, 2023. The album, meanwhile, will be announced soon.

For more information about Jonathan Max, please visit his official website or contact him directly.

Rootness team
Rootness Sàrl

Hard To Deny You
